preface.title: About This Guide
preface.para: &sles4sapreg; is the reference platform for SAP's software development. It is optimized in various ways for SAP applications. This guide provides detailed information about installing and customizing &sles4sap;.

section.title: Overview
section.para: The &sles4sap; Guide is divided into the following chapters:

listitem.para: Here you will find an overview of &sles4sap;.
This chapter explains in detail the available installation scenarios for &sles4sap;.
This chapter provides details about remote installation scenarios for &sles4sap;.
In this chapter the components are listed and additionally you will find hints about configuring &sles4sap;.
